sentences.english: Then, which kinds of soil can adsorb the nuclides well?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，什麼樣的土壤對核素的吸附性能較好？

sentences.english: Objective Using dual nuclide renal dynamic imaging to evaluate renal function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討雙核素腎動態顯像對腎功能的評價。

sentences.english: After treating for 4 weeks, the gastric emptying rate of rats was measured by radioisotopic technique.
sentences.chinese: 用藥4周後，用放射性核素法檢測其胃的排空率。

sentences.english: Decay chains of some parent nu-clides are discussed as well.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還對某些核素的衰變鏈作了適當討論。

sentences.english: A Nuclide Chart software developed by the author himself has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了作者開發的核素圖軟件。

sentences.english: Gamma camera belongs to the radiation nuclide imaging equipment.
sentences.chinese: 相機屬於放射性核素成像設備。

sentences.english: Objective To study the distinction of the renal dynamic radionuclide imaging in acute upper urinary tract obstruction and their pathological changes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究急性上尿路梗阻腎核素顯像特點及病理改變。

sentences.english: The changes in distribution of radioactive nuclide are correlated with the types of liver injury.
sentences.chinese: 放射性核素分佈變化與肝損傷類型有較好的相關性。

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4

definition: atomic weight of an element/atomic mass
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
